trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control.
The TextBoxControlBuilder class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.
This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Determines whether the literal string of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> control must be HTML decoded.
Use the HtmlDecodeLiterals method to determine whether the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
This implementation of the method always returns `true` to indicate that the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
